original: Let’s say you do get back, [mc]… What if there are two of you?

original: I figured this would come up. What if I was ‘copied’ instead of ‘pasted,’ right? The original me probably still exists.

original: I've thought about it. Even if there are two of me, I think my Arcadia would be open and accepting of that. Might even be fun.
translation: 我想过了，即使有两个我，我想我的Arcadia也会坦然接受。甚至会很有趣

original: You’ve got me there, but let’s take my example to its next logical conclusion... What if there are three of you? Four of you? Infinite universes, infinite you. Or so the theory goes.
translation: 你说对了，但让我们把我的例子推导到下一个逻辑结论... 如果你们有三个人呢？四个你？无限的宇宙，无限的你，理论上是可能的。

original: Mmm… I wouldn’t mind infinite of him.

original: That’s probably the exact problem, [mox]! So you're saying this issue is bigger than me?
translation: 这可能正是问题所在，[mox]！你是说这个问题比我本身还严重？

original: How can you ever rest knowing that you could get torn into yet another universe, and another, and another, forevermore?
translation: 如果你知道自己可能会被撕裂到另一个宇宙，另一个宇宙，另一个宇宙，直到永远，你怎么能安息？

original: The thought alone haunts me.

original: It could be happening to us all, though.
translation: 不过，这可能发生在我们每个人身上。

original: Maybe – but we know it’s definitely happening to you.
translation: 也许吧——但我们知道这肯定发生在你身上。

original: If I were you, I’d do everything to anchor myself to this reality, so you never have to go through this again.
translation: 如果我是你，我会想尽一切办法让自己融入这个现实，这样你就再也不用经历这些了。

original: If all this interdimensional magic is real, there should be a way to nullify it. Ordinary magic has such counters.
translation: 如果所有这些次元魔法都是真的，那就应该有办法让它失效。普通魔法就有这样的对策。

original: Now that’s some real food for thought.

original: And I’m starving!

translation: 这是我的一部旧手机，我想它对你来说会比放在抽屉里吃灰更有用。

original: I already have a bunch of things already installed on there. I'm not sure what you do know and what you don't, so just ask me anything!
translation: 我已经在上面安装了很多东西。我不知道你想要什么，也知道你不太了解我们这，所以有什么问题尽管问我！

original: If you give your number to others, they'll be able to send you handy messages from wherever, whenever. I'd make a habit of sharing your number with everyone you meet.
translation: 如果你把自己的号码告诉别人，他们就可以随时随地给你发送快捷信息。我会养成习惯，与你遇到的每个人分享你的电话号码。

original: I use this app all the time! It keeps me on track for what I have to do next.
translation: 我一直在使用这个应用程序！它让我知道下一步该做什么。

original: Good idea. I'll add all my leads and goals in here so I can stay focused.
translation: 好主意。我会把我所有的线索和目标都添加到这里，这样我们就能保持专注了。

original: If you take any pictures, they'll appear here. You can browse them again on your phone whenever you want.
translation: 如果你拍摄了照片，它们就会出现在这里。你可以随时在手机上再次浏览它们。

original: I think there might already be a few in there already!
translation: 我想里面可能已经有一些了！

original: That's a social website where people post general updates. You can use it to keep up to date with your friends, or things happening around the city.
translation: 这是一个人们发布一般动态信息的社交网站。你可以用它来了解朋友的最新动态或城市周围发生的事情。

original: Like the other apps, you'll see a notification if there's a new post there.
translation: 与其他应用程序一样，如果有新的帖子，你会看到通知。

original: Enchanted Threads is a favorite online store of mine. It typically sells clothing. It's handy for me because I wear a cape and hat when performing.
translation: Enchanted Threads 是我最喜欢的一家网上商店。它主要销售服装。这对我来说很方便，因为我在表演时会穿斗篷戴帽子。

original: And Midnight Emporium, uhm... is a little embarrassing. It's an online sex shop that sells whatever your imagination can conjure, and worse!
translation: 而 “午夜商店”，呃......有点尴尬。它是一家网上性用品商店，卖你想象不到的东西，甚至更糟！

original: Here you can listen to any music. This phone is already full of music, so feel free to give it a listen.
translation: 在这里你可以聆听任何音乐。这款手机已经有很多音乐，所以请随意试听。

original: Ah, that's just some silly app I forgot to remove. It promised to add 'cheats' to reality, like infinite money, and out of curiosity I installed it. Obviously I never got it to work. Maybe you'd have better luck? Ahaha.
translation: 啊，那只是一个我忘了删除的无聊应用程序。它承诺能在现实中添加 “作弊 ”功能，比如无限赚钱，出于好奇，我安装了它。很显然，我从来没让它起过作用。也许你的运气会更好？啊哈哈。

original: Here you can change the phone's background, various sound settings, text size, and other things. You know.
translation: 在这里你可以更改手机背景、各种声音设置、文字大小等。你懂的。

original: Oh, and you'll be able to open your phone up almost whenever you want! I won't blame you for being rude! Although some may~
translation: 哦，你几乎可以随时随地打开手机！我不会责怪你的无礼！虽然有些人会~

original: Why don't you give it a try now? I'll send you a message!
translation: 为什么不试试呢？我会给你发信息的

original: (You just received a message! See that notification in the top right? Try pressing the phone icon!)
translation: (您刚刚收到一条信息！看到右上角的通知了吗？按一下手机图标试试！)

original: Aren't you going to check it?
translation: 你不打算检查一下吗？

original: Wow, that was quite a forward message!
translation: 哇，这真是一条前卫的信息！

original: Haha, it's easier to be more forward when it's over text instead of face-to-face.
translation: 哈哈，通过文字而不是面对面交流，更容易让人产生好感~

original: But I'm right here!
translation: 但我就在这儿！

original: Hey, don't apply logic to the stuff I say!
translation: 嘿，别把逻辑套在我说的话上！

original: Thank you so much, I only have one question... Where am I supposed to put this? I have no pockets.
translation: 非常感谢，只有一个问题...... 我应该把这个放哪儿？我没有口袋

original: Ahah, don't worry, I thought about that too! Here, take one of my satchels.
translation: 啊哈，别担心，我也想到了！来，拿着我的书包。

original: You're too good for me.
translation: 你对我真的太好了。

original: I know you'll return the favor for all my help eventually, right? Ehehe.
translation: 我知道你最终会回报我的帮助的，对吧？诶嘿嘿

original: That's a tall order considering how much you've done for me already. But I will try my best.
translation: 考虑到你已经为我做了这么多，哪怕这个要求很高。我也会尽力而为。

original: Awh, I was only kidding! Well, actually I was trying to make a naughty joke.
translation: 啊赫，我只是开个玩笑！好吧，其实我是想开个调皮的玩笑。

original: Ahaha, if that's the case, I can deliver!
translation: 啊哈哈，如果是这样的话，我可以自投罗网！

original: Oh I bet you can, Mr. Biggus Dickus.
translation: 哦，我打赌你能，妲-极-坝先生。

original: I've been wondering, the [mox] I know had only recently moved to Arcadia, but you seem to be comfortably settled here. How long have you been living in Arcadia so far?
translation: 我一直在想，我认识的那个 [mox] 最近才搬到Arcadia，但你似乎已经在这里安顿下来了。你在Arcadia住了多久了？

original: I’ve been living here for a couple of years now, moved in from a village to the west.
translation: 我从西边的一个村庄搬到这里，已经住了几年了。

original: You were originally in a wagon, right?
translation: 你最初住在一辆篷车里，对吗？

original: Yep! My magic act took off, so I sold the wagon last year and bought this apartment.
translation: 是的！我的魔术事业成功了，所以去年我卖掉了篷车，买下了这套公寓。

original: Wait… {i}bought{/i}? Not rented?
translation: 等等......{i}买的{{/i}?  不是租的？

original: Correct! You could say I’m rolling with the dough.
translation: 没错 你可以说我在和面团里打滚。

original: I think the saying ‘rolling {i}in{/i} the dough’. Or is that yet another subtle change in this universe?
translation: 我想这就是俗话说的 “滚 {i} 进{/i} 面团”。还是说，这是这个宇宙中又一个微妙的变化？

original: No, you’re right, but I mean by ‘with,’ is that I’m caught in the same rolling pin as the money. Rather than riding the money wave, I’m swept up in it.
translation: 不，你是对的，但我说的 “与”，是指我被卷入了与金钱相同的漩涡。我并没有乘着金钱的浪潮前进，而是被卷了进去。

original: Honestly, I was hoping for company like you. It’s a great reason to try all the places I wouldn’t go alone.
translation: 老实说，我希望能有你这样的同伴。这是我尝试不去如何地方找任何人的好理由。

original: If you don’t mind me asking, why do you think you’re so successful? You were always moderately successful in my universe, but this is unprecedented.
translation: 如果你不介意我这么问的话，你觉得为什么自己会这么成功？在我那世界里，你一直都算成功，但这是前所未有的成绩。

original: Every time you’ve described your world, it’s seemed a little brighter and happier than this one. Maybe an entertainer like me isn’t needed as much there.
translation: 每次你描述你的世界时，似乎都比这个世界更光明、更快乐。也许那里不太需要我这样的艺人吧。

original: Yeah… I’ve noticed a gloom over this Arcadia. What exactly is it?
translation: 是啊......我注意到这个Arcadia笼罩着一层阴霾。到底是为什么呢？

original: Where do I start? We're in a nice part of town, but the poverty line is rising, refugees from the dark lands are flooding in. Imports have stopped, and we're facing food shortages as crop yields fall.
translation: 我该从何说起？我们住在城里的一个好地方，但贫困率正在上升，来自黑暗之地的难民涌入。进口已经停止，随着农作物减产，我们正面临粮食短缺。

original: The Queen’s rule is becoming more oppressive. I can’t blame her entirely.
translation: 女王的统治越来越专制了。但我们不能完全责怪她。

original: The ground quakes, nights grow darker. They say the end times are near.
translation: 地动山摇，夜色渐深。有人说说末世即将来临。

original: The world is changing rapidly, becoming more perilous by the day. When a region is abandoned and becomes uninhabitable, we consider it part of the 'dark lands.'
translation: 世界瞬息万变，危险与日俱增。当一个地区被遗弃，变得不适合生物居住时，我们就会认为它成了 “黑暗之地 ”的一部分。

original: Initially, the influx of refugees boosted Arcadia's growth and economy. But now, we've reached a tipping point. The city can't keep up with the demand, and poverty is casting a shadow over everything we've built.
translation: 最初，难民的涌入促进了Arcadia的发展和经济。但现在，我们已经到了一个临界点。城市的发展跟不上需求，贫困给我们所建设的一切蒙上了阴影。

original: Queen [aur], in her efforts to maintain control and order, has resorted to harsher methods. Stricter laws, greater punishments, and an unyielding grip on power.
translation: 女王 [aur] 为了维持控制和秩序，采取了更加严厉的手段。更严格的法律，更严厉的惩罚，以及对权力锱铢必较的控制。

original: Arcadia has been under her rule for thousands of years and was once considered a utopia. But in such demanding times, no ruler can come out looking good.
translation: Arcadia已被她统治了数千年，一度被视为乌托邦。但在这样一个艰难的时代，任何统治者都不可能有好成绩。

original: That’s not to say she’s been perfect. The weight of the world’s troubles has hardened her heart.
translation: 这并不是说她是完美的。世间烦恼的重压让她的心变得坚硬。

original: I wish I could explain the earthquakes, but no one really knows why they happen. They're incredibly disruptive, though the city is built with safeguards against them.
translation: 我希望我能向你解释一下地震，但没有人真正知道为什么会发生地震。虽然这座城市在建设过程中采取了防范措施，但地震的破坏性还是令人难以置信。

original: Then there's the massive, jagged scar of a ravine cutting through the city. It's been part of Arcadia as far back as history goes.
translation: 此外，还有一道巨大而嶙峋的峡谷疤痕横穿城市。有史以来，它就是Arcadia的一部分。

original: Conspiracy theories suggest it's not a natural formation.
translation: 有阴谋论认为这不是自然形成的。

original: Yes, the nights seem to be getting darker, but only in the dark lands.
translation: 是的，夜似乎越来越黑了，但只是在黑暗之地。

original: It’s not due to a lack of moonlight, sun, or stars – it’s like the very essence of night is growing deeper, more oppressive.
translation: 这不是因为缺少月光、太阳或星星，而是夜的本质越来越深，越来越压抑。

original: Some say the sun is weakening, but even that doesn’t fully explain it. It’s enough to make you wonder if the end times are really near.
translation: 有人说太阳正在减弱，但即使这样也不能完全解释这一切。这足以让你怀疑末日是否真的临近。

original: I sit back and ponder everything [mox] has said for a few quiet moments.
translation: 我坐下来，静静地思考了一会儿 [mox] 所说的一切。
context:

original: I wonder, what could be causing all these changes? What's the key difference between this universe and the other?

original: Well…
Your world… I bet it doesn’t have {i}them{/i}.

original: Who are ‘they’?

original: It's taboo to talk about them. People say that even thinking about them can summon them... But since you’re new, they’re...

original: …{i}Nightmares{/i}.
Strange shadowy creatures that have been slowly consuming the land, maybe even the planet.
translation: 奇怪的阴暗生物正在慢慢吞噬这片土地，甚至整个星球。

original: The only place that seems safe is under the Queen's light, as the sun shines less elsewhere.
translation: 唯一看起来安全的地方就是女王的光辉之下，因为其他地方的阳光照射较少。

original: As I try to piece together the puzzle in my mind, it all starts to click.
translation: 当我努力拼凑脑海中的拼图时，一切开始变得清晰起来。

original: That may explain the population density, rapid technological advancement, the Queen’s attitude, and why the Virtues never met.

original: It even explains why you moved here so much sooner.

original: Yeah, my village is dark now.

original: In the ‘dark lands’?

original: Yeah…

original: Hehe, you’ve got me figured out. That's the fourth reason I wanted you to stay, because you’re just like me.
